PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-00562011-02-03,  ,  ,  HC, 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectFace Protectors for Ice Hockey and Box Lacrosse Players Regulations
PrecisFACE PROTECTORS FOR ICE HOCKEY AND BOX LACROSSE PLAYERS REGULATIONS - will be made from Item 20 of Part I of Schedule I to the Hazardous Products Act in order to continue to reference the Canadian Standards Association standard and to address gaps that otherwise would have been created by the coming into force of the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act on June 20, 2011.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0020 Publication Date: 2011-02-16
